summary: A piano player discovers that the lovely girl at the coat-check of a jazz club has the voice of an angel, and persuades her to form a musical act with him.
cast: Amy Adams|Alec Newman|Scott Anderson|JB Blanc|Moon Bloodgood|Felix J. Boyle|Justin Carroll|Michael Cavanaugh|Scott Cohen|Khani Cole|Kenneth Colom|Nikki Davis|Derek de Lint|Joey DeFrancesco|Kim Delgado|Dennis Fanning|Jeremy Glazer|Jaimyse Haft|Harriet Sansom Harris|Lou Ippolito|Gina Juliet|Mimi Lee|Michael Raymond-James|Darryl Roberts
title: Moonlight Serenade
